content: I’m a PhD graduate student at the School of Mathematical and Statitstical Sciences at Clemson University. My advisor is Dr. Whitney Huang. My research interests include spatial/spatiotemporal modelling and data fusion with a focus on environmental data. In my current project we propose a conditional approach to jointly modeling wind speed and wind direction.
summary: I’m a PhD student at the School of Mathematical and Statistical Sciences at Clemson University. My advisor is Dr. Whitney Huang. My research interests include spatial/spatiotemporal modelling and data fusion with a focus on environmental data.
title: Eva Murphy
